abstract_summ: Study conducted a retrospective analysis of clinical characteristics and mortal causes in Chinese COVID-19 death patients . Hypertension was most common coexisting disorder and respiratory failure was the most common direct cause of death . Heart disease was identified as an important risk factor for death in the aged patients . ACE2 and TMPRSS2 were the targets of SARS-CoV-2, we analyzed their expression in different organs .
